content:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/cli_tool/runner.py
DIR_STATE:["src/cli_tool/__init__.py", "src/cli_tool/changelog.py", "src/cli_tool/cli.py", "src/cli_tool/runner.py", "src/cli_tool/scaffold.py"]
SUMMARY: Implemented a single deterministic canonical runner that creates runtime/_build/<run_id>/ and emits standardized manifest, logs, decision traces, and outputs with preflight determinism checks.
